mapper.select: select entityId, topCcmtsSyslogServerIpAddr, topCcmtsSyslogServerIndex, topCcmtsSyslogServerIpPort from cmcSyslogServerEntry where entityId = #{entityId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cmcSyslogServerEntry(entityId, topCcmtsSyslogServerIpAddr, topCcmtsSyslogServerIndex, topCcmtsSyslogServerIpPort) VALUES (#{entityId}, #{ip}, #{topCcmtsSyslogServerIndex}, #{topCcmtsSyslogServerIpPort})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cmcSyslogServerEntry WHERE entityId = #{entityId} and topCcmtsSyslogServerIndex = #{topCcmtsSyslogServerIndex}
mapper.update: UPDATE cmcSyslogServerEntry SET topCcmtsSyslogServerIpAddr=#{ip}, topCcmtsSyslogServerIpPort=#{topCcmtsSyslogServerIpPort} WHERE entityId=#{entityId} AND topCcmtsSyslogServerIndex=#{topCcmtsSyslogServerIndex}
